select ifnull(sum(t.single_pi_price),0) from( select df_order_id, single_pi_price from daifa_ggoods where take_goods_status=1 and take_goods_date=${day} GROUP BY df_order_id )t

SELECT ifnull(sum(t.single_pi_price),0) FROM ( SELECT *, MIN(take_goods_status) minStatus FROM daifa_ggoods_tasks WHERE create_date = ${day} and seller_id=${sellerId} GROUP BY df_order_id ) t WHERE t.minStatus =2
SELECT sum(ifnull(services_fee,0)) FROM daifa_trade WHERE seller_id =${sellerId} AND date_format(send_time, "%Y%m%d") =${day}
SELECT ifnull(sum(express_fee),0) FROM daifa_send WHERE create_date = ${day} AND seller_id = ${sellerId}

SELECT IFNULL(sum(t.rf), 0) FROM ( SELECT t1.df_trade_id, t1.market_name, t1.store_num, t1.goods_code, t1.single_pi_price, IFNULL ( return_goods_fee, single_pi_price ) rf FROM daifa_order t1, daifa_trade t2 WHERE ( date_format( t1.return_goods_finish_time, "%Y%m%d" ) = ${day} OR date_format( t1.refund_finish_time, "%Y%m%d" ) = ${day} ) AND t1.df_trade_id = t2.df_trade_id AND t2.seller_id = ${sellerId} ) t

SELECT ${day} day, df_trade_id dfTradeId, express_name expressName, express_code expressCode, express_fee expressFee FROM daifa_send WHERE create_date = ${day} AND seller_id = ${sellerId} limit ${start},${end}
SELECT count(*) FROM daifa_send WHERE create_date = ${day} AND seller_id = ${sellerId}

SELECT date_format(t1.create_time, "%Y-%m-%d")inStockDay, t2.df_trade_id dfTradeId, t2.market_name marketName, t3.store_num storeNum, t3.goods_code goodsNo, t2.single_pi_price piPriceString
FROM daifa_after_receive_expres_stock t1, daifa_after_sale_sub t2, daifa_order t3 WHERE t1.relevance_status = 1 AND t1.df_order_id = t2.df_order_id AND t2.df_order_id = t3.df_order_id AND t2.after_status = 4 AND t2.seller_id = ${sellerId} AND date_format(t1.create_time, "%Y%m%d")=${day} limit #{start},#{end}

SELECT count(*) FROM daifa_after_receive_expres_stock t1, daifa_after_sale_sub t2, daifa_order t3 WHERE t1.relevance_status = 1 AND t1.df_order_id = t2.df_order_id AND t2.df_order_id = t3.df_order_id AND t2.after_status = 4 AND t2.seller_id = ${sellerId} AND date_format(t1.create_time, "%Y%m%d")=${day}

SELECT date_format(t.rt, "%Y%m%d") refundedDay, t.df_trade_id dfTradeId, t.market_name marketName, t.store_num storeNum, t.goods_code goodsNo, t.single_pi_price piPriceString FROM ( SELECT t1.df_trade_id, t1.market_name, t1.store_num, t1.goods_code, t1.single_pi_price, IFNULL( t1.return_goods_finish_time, t1.refund_finish_time ) rt FROM daifa_order t1, daifa_trade t2 WHERE ( date_format( t1.return_goods_finish_time, "%Y%m%d" ) = ${day} OR date_format( t1.refund_finish_time, "%Y%m%d" ) = ${day} ) AND t1.df_trade_id = t2.df_trade_id AND t2.seller_id = ${sellerId} limit #{start},#{end} ) t
SELECT SUM( single_pi_price * goods_num ) FROM daifa_send_order WHERE send_status = 2 AND seller_id = ${sellerId} AND create_date = ${time}
SELECT SUM( t1.services_fee ) FROM daifa_trade t1 LEFT JOIN daifa_send t2 ON t1.df_trade_id = t2.df_trade_id WHERE t2.send_status = 2 AND t2.seller_id = ${sellerId} AND t2.create_date = ${time}
SELECT SUM( express_fee ) FROM daifa_send WHERE send_status = 2 AND seller_id = ${sellerId} AND create_date = ${time}

SELECT sum( t2.store_return_money ) FROM daifa_order t1, daifa_after_sale_sub t2 WHERE t1.return_goods_status = 2 AND DATE_FORMAT( return_goods_finish_time, "%Y%m%d" ) = ${time} AND t1.df_order_id = t2.df_order_id
